metadata.title: CVE-2019-11474 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: coders/xwd.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.31 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (floating-point exception and application crash) by crafting an XWDimage file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-11008 andCVE-2019-11009.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
